product_name: Rareform Stand Up Paddleboard Paddle Blade Cover
long_description: Protect your paddle blade and show off a little style with the Rareform Stand Up Paddleboard Paddle Blade Cover. Each cover is made from upcycled vinyl for a unique look and high durability.
short_description: Protect your paddle blade and show off a little style with the Rareform Stand Up Paddleboard Paddle Blade Cover. Each cover is made from upcycled vinyl for a unique look and high durability.
